job.title: Team Lead — Python  Development
job.description:
We are seeking a Senior Django Developer to join our wonderful team!

The project:
PBM Source provides legal services in the pharmaceutical sector for US companies, facilitating tracking and implementing regulatory changes within organizations.

Team:

Product Owner (Client Side)
Project Manager (Digis)
Quality Assurance (Digis)
React Developer (Digis)
Django Developer (Digis)

Project Technologies/Libraries/Tools: Django, GitLab CI/CD, Django Rest Framework, Celery, Redis, PostgreSQL, Docker, Django-OTP, AWS, Heroku.

Project Advantages:

Client communication is constant, with clear task descriptions or designs provided before assignment to developers.
The client prioritizes code quality and welcomes suggestions for process improvement.
Well-established workflow: tasks and designs are transferred to Jira, questions are asked, tasks are estimated, and versions are released.
Extensive testing both internally and by the client.
The entire team, including the PM, is from Digis, ensuring openness and clarity in all communications.
Requirements:

7+ years of experience in software development.
5+ years of senior-level software development experience with Python (Django).
Solid experience with PostgreSQL database.
Intermediate+ spoken English.
What we offer:

Professional development opportunities.
Interesting and challenging projects.
Remote work with full-time, long-term employment.
Grant options allocation based on demonstrated abilities.
High-level compensation tied to performance reviews.
Flexible working hours.
Tasks with challenging opportunities.
Knowledge exchange.
If you’re interested in this opportunity, please attach your CV.

We’ll provide you with more information. We are looking forward to your applications!

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a skilled and experienced Team Lead in Python Development to join our team. This is a long-term project that will last for more than 6 months. 

As the Team Lead, you will be responsible for leading a team of developers in the development of web applications using Python, .NET Framework, and JavaScript. You should have a strong background in web development and be proficient in these technologies. 

The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of successfully leading development teams and delivering high-quality projects on time. Excellent communication and leadership skills are essential for this role.

To apply, please submit a proposal outlining how you can contribute to this project. Please include links to some of your past completed projects that demonstrate your expertise in Python development. We look forward to reviewing your application and discussing further details with you.
